runs.comm: full bunger on the stumps, chopped into the leg side for one
tight line outside off, angled across and Gayle ... [hushed silence] leaves
back of a length and this trampolines over Gayle's head, over Kieswetter and away for a couple more wides
pushed through on a good line outside off, again Gayle raises his bat out of the way
length ball, bit of width and Gayle has a swing at this one, only to carve out a fresh slice of air

full and straight, blocked down the ground and fielded at mid-off, who hits the stumps with the throw - though Gayle was in and the bails had already been knocked off by Finn's knee in his delivery, so England would have needed to take a stump fully out of the ground, presumably?
touch short, on the stumps and defended into the leg side
on the legs, might have rolled his fingers over it, hit on the pad but must have pitched outside the line
again fired down the leg side, nudged into the midwicket area
length ball outside off, pushed towards point
slower ball, down the leg side and Smith gets a tickle on it, fielded by Kieswetter
touch short, effort ball from Dernbach but Smith doesn't waste too much effort banging a pull shot over midwicket for the first boundary of the innings
short and wide this time, Smith lasers a cut shot straight a cover, where Ravi Bopara puts his ability to open a ring pull on the line and effects a smart stop
full and straight from Finn, driven to mid-off

bounced him, that's gone a long way ... up, and Bairstow is under it at fine leg! Gayle goes to a miscued pull shot, just done for pace and the top edge flew just where England wanted it to go. West Indies' box-office opener is in the can
short ball on the stumps, worked into the leg side
length ball and blocked in front of off
full and on off, Simmons drives and gets an inside edge to square leg
short and angling in, Smith drives at it on the back foot, edging on to his body but they steal one anyway
short and pulled aggressively through square leg for four
pitched up outside off, slapped to mid-off
bouncer, well directed and Smith ducks underneath it
slower ball, almost a full toss but it dips at the last minute and the batsman digs it out towards midwicket
yorker length, wide of the stumps and at full pace this time, Smith can't get his bat down in time to connect
slower ball, on a length and shovelled behind square on the leg side
touch short but still a decent length, fizzes through off the pitch and over the stumps as Smith swivels to pull but misses
full and straight, dug out back down the pitch, hitting the stumps at the non-striker's end and running to mid-off
they won't be needed this time, though, as Simmons steps away to dispatch a full-length ball through - literally - Ravi Bopara at cover
length ball, nudged to mid-on
short and does Smith for pace, cutting him in half as he tries to hook
length ball, on the stumps, Smith swings, the ball deflects off something and is caught by Kieswetter - must have been the thigh pad

touch short and scooped away on the leg side - again Bairstow is underneath the ball and this time he takes a fantastic catch, diving at full length! The ball probably wasn't there to pull and it was an ugly smear from Simmons, Bairstow running round and in from deep square leg to complete the dismissal
length ball, rolls the fingers over it and Smith misses out
touch shorter, pulled through square leg
length outside off, driven to extra-cover
overpitched and in the slot for such a languid driver as Samuels, who chauffeurs the ball to the deep cover boundary
length ball, wide of the stumps and with the pace taken off a touch, Samuels fails to connect with an airy swipe
tossed up outside off and pushed to point

flighted, spinning back and gone! Samuels stayed deep in his crease, was beaten by the turn and there was a scrape of bat or glove and Kieswetter clung on behind the stumps. For the umpteenth time, Swann claims a wicket in his opening over
defended playing back in front of off
tossed up outside off, played with the spin through the leg side
full and flighted, pushed for one to long-off
on the stumps, goes back and across to nudge through midwicket
tossed up and tickled to fine leg - a good through keeps them honest
floated up on the stumps and pushed back to the bowler
chopped into the covers, they scramble one and then pick up another for a misfield from Patel at the non-striker's end
length ball, tapped to midwicket
tossed up on the stumps, played back to Patel
outside off and chopped through square
length ball, on off and spinning in, driven to long-on
tossed up, holds its line and Smith gets a leading edge trying to work to leg
length, Smith steps out to narrow the gap and sweeps hard through square leg, beaten Bairstow's dive on the rope
gives this some air outside off ... and Smith gives it some air back over his head for a mow over wide long-on
pushed through a bit quicker and flatter, squeezed towards point
tossed up on the stumps, gets across and nudges to midwicket
flat, on off and not much turn, chopped to cover
bit more air this time, driven back to the bowler
sliding down the leg side, Smith misses with an attempted glance
full and on the stumps, Smith swings straight through the line and deposits a big six back down the ground - he's motoring now
on the stumps, angling in and inside-edged on to the pads, scotching an lbw appeal from Patel
clipped to long-off for one
length, played back to the bowler coming forward
full ball, dug out to point
ooo nearly a run out after they refuse a run to the 45, poor throw saves Bravo
tucked into midwicket, excellent work from Bopara saves a single
full and chipped over Bopara this time and they take two
driven with an open face, a little bit of an edge gets it very fine towards third man and they take three
length outside off and guided down to third man
length and blocked back to Broad
width offered and it's cracked straight to point, missed out
slighter slower bouncer, the pull was a poor attempt and underneath the line
fuller and slapped down to long off
back of a length, pushed at and missed
fired onto middle and leg, off the pad to short third man
stepped back and cut out to the cover sweeper
huge stroke down the ground, tossed up and a wonderful strike almost into the press box, amazing strike
nudged into the covers
brave boy Swann offering more flight, clipped over midwicket for another couple
waited for and played very late but Broad dives well and saves and gets back up and saves the second, excellent work
length outside off, flashed down to third man off the back foot
picked up over cow corner into the crowd, another superb strike, lovely timing
much fuller and outside off, pushed down to long off
not short enough for the pull but Bravo does so anyway out to deep square leg
bumper outside off but too short and possible too wide too
another beauty down the ground, straight as a dye and into the crowd, fabulous strike, great technique and brilliant power
nudged to point
floated up outside off and lifted out to deep cover
dragged down but pulled straight to deep midwicket
slower outside off and the drive misses
length and dropped down to long on, just the single
waited for and cut past point for four, excellent placement on the late cut
pulled into the deep on the on side
a length ball disappears over long on, Smith in the zone now, way back, clear the front leg and boom

edged and taken by Kieswetter. Full and wide outside off and a wild drive produces a thin edge through to the keeper. Good wicket at a good time for England but Smith has played a good hand there for West Indies
short, they'll all be now, outside off and mistimed to point
another short ball and it's excellent, shaping back and going through at head height, it was well evaded but superb from Finn
short once more, off the body behind square on the on side
fuller and pushed just behind backward point
full and flicked into midwicket
length and Pollard steps away and slaps it over Patel's head for four
another mow down the ground but this is just to long on
middle and leg and turned to leg, cow corner comes in
down the ground this time for six, brilliant strike, tossed up and hammered
slapped straight again but not caught this and just to long on for one again
full and wide of off stump and pushed to point, reaching for the drive
full toss and smashed over deep midwicket, wasn't a great delivery
shot! Up and over extra cover into the new stand, fabulous power and timing, massive hit
leg side wide now attempting a back of the hand slower ball
another slower one, heading leg side again but pushed to backward point
went down for the paddle sweep from outside off stump, doesn't catch it that well and just a single as the keeper goes round
slower ball outside off and flailed into the off side, just over point, Morgan's dive can't get there
short, slower ball, comes off the body and they scramble a run
another short slower one, Bravo steps away to try and lift it to third man but misses
another slower ball, fuller this time and driven wide of long off so they can take two

what on earth, slower and off the body down the leg side, the shy from the keeper misses, and then Broad gathers and tries to shy at the non-strikes end and his hand hits the batsman and he misses too
short and the ball goes to Derby, absolutely creamed, he was set for it because they changed the field and this is nailed
fuller, another heave and deep midwicket goes around to field
back of a length, pulled just wide of long on, the dive doesn't get there and a boundary to start the over
slower and dispatched into the crowd, another beautiful strike, clean, through the line and another maximum
full outside off and a wide
it wide again, and a full toss, lucky for Dernbach it was edged into the body and they take one into the covers
finally gets the slower one right, a swing and a miss, they try to take a bye, Kieswetter hits but Bravo gets home in time
full, lashed over cover, well fielded on the bounce
another wide outside off
slower ball, shortish and slugged over square leg into the gap so more runs to finish
